questionText: By which gate in Jerusalem is Bethesda?
On what day did Jesus heal the invalid by Bethesda?
What reason does Jesus give for why the Jews "search the Scriptures"?
answerText: They "think that in them you have eternal life"

questionText: How many times does Matthew's gospel quote "I desire mercy, and not sacrifice"?
During the time of which high priest did David eat the bread of the Presence?
When Jesus heals the man with the shriveled hand, whose gospel records that Jesus experienced anger and grief?
Which prophet spoke: "A bruised reed he will not break, and a smoldering wick he will not quench?"
What is another name for Thaddaeus, one of the twelve apostles?
Who is blessed, "for theirs is the kingdom of God?"
When salt has lost its taste, what is it good for?
answerText: To be thrown out and trampled under people's feet

questionText: For those who relax the least of the commandments of the Law, what will they be called?
answerText: Least in the kingdom of heaven

questionText: Performing what action will make you "liable to the council?"
Can you make one hair white or black?
What does Jesus say the hypocrites do when they pray?
answerText: "they love to stand and pray in the synagogues and at the street corners, that they may be seen by others"

questionText: What reason does Jesus give for saying "No one can serve two masters?"
answerText: "for either he will hate the one and love the other, or he will be devoted to the one and despise the other."

questionText: What must be done before taking the speck out of your brother's eye?
answerText: "first take the log out of your own eye"

questionText: How does Jesus say false prophets are recognized?
answerText: "You will recognize them by their fruits"

questionText: Through which groups of people did the centurion speak to Jesus?
answerText: The elders of the Jews and his friends

questionText: Near the gate of which town did Jesus raise a widow's son from the dead?
Who is greater than John the Baptist?
answerText: The one who is least in the kingdom of heaven / God

questionText: Which cities does Jesus contrast with Tyre and Sidon?
What city does Jesus contrast with Sodom?
Jesus's feet were anointed with ointment contained in what kind of flask?
Luke records Jesus saying "Your sins are forgiven" how many times?
Who is Herod's household manager?
